title: Thank you Riot!
body:
Thank you so much for the lovely gift, it really made my day. 

In such a competitive environment it's so hard to keep your cool. I haven't been a saint either, but this kind of positive reinforcement will make me strive to be more understanding, tolerant and level-headed. 

I'm not sure if I fully deserve this awesome gift, part of me says yes and the other not so much. I'm just happy to have gotten a token from you guys, it didn't matter what it was, it was the gesture that made me feel so grateful. 

Cheers!

replies.body: I got the Mystery Skin pop up when logging in.   No idea what I got though.  There was no text to indicate what skin it was :(
GG WP dude, keep being a positive influence in our community!
Almost shed manly tears when I saw the free skin

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TQZIsXua,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-09T06:52:47.869+0000)
>
> GG WP dude, keep being a positive influence in our community!

Meanwhile some of us are still waiting T_T

I got chrome rammus  :o

Never saw that reward coming :o!!!
Something tells me they are rolling them out alphabetically.
na they aren't - possibly player id or something

> [{quoted}](name=Nallchax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TQZIsXua,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-09T07:07:33.201+0000)
>
> Something tells me they are rolling them out alphabetically.

my friends summoner name starts with T, he already got his
nice!!! earnest elf tristana!!! tbh since its  legacy im ok with it.
Thank you Riot XD I also got the lovely surprise when I logged on today. Really appreciate it and will continue to strive to be a positive force in game!

ye THNX HEAPS this morning i played a game or two then wasn't really getting into it this morning as i used, but after a few games i get this mystery skin pop up from riot saying thankyu for your great behaivour and team work as a reawrd here is a mystery skin i opened it and got DRAGON BLADE RIVEN when it said i got that i was so happy it made my day i have wanted that skin for so long man its so good been playing riven alot now thnx heaps it really did put a smile on my face this morning.

Hi Riot,

I have gotten the mystery gift after I logged in, but it didn't show which skin I received. May I ask how do you know what skins you have received?

Thanks!
Try looking in gifting history maybe?
nope nothing there, already checked. Could it be that we got gifted a skin we already have? cause it seems a few people have this issue?
I got sweeper alistar, I never play this, Take it back.... take it back!!
